main_definition: To move upwards or increase in level, quantity, quality, or value.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To get up from a sitting or lying position.
meanings_and_examples.example: Every morning, I rise at 6 am to start my day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sudden increase in the price of something.
meanings_and_examples.example: The cost of living has risen dramatically over the past year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To move upward, as when a balloon ascends or an elevator goes to a higher floor.
meanings_and_examples.example: As the hot air rose from the fireplace, it filled the room with warmth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become more prominent or popular.
meanings_and_examples.example: The band's latest album has risen in popularity since its release.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A series of political changes and developments, often following a time of unrest or decline.
meanings_and_examples.example: After the revolution, many countries experienced social and economic rise as they rebuilt their societies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To increase in size or amount.
meanings_and_examples.example: The number of visitors to the museum has risen steadily each year.
